name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】げまずえでぃしょん!!!!【#ホロゲマズ結成記念LIVE2024】 [qIbjRU2Mo8I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio and Shirakami Fubuki continue their performance of the song 'Turing Love' on a futuristic stage.
Instrumental interlude and transition between songs.
Inugami Korone and Nekomata Okayu perform the song 'Remocon' with high-energy dancing and a digital-themed backdrop.

subtitles.original: ちょーわそー　あいしょうミステイク
subtitles.english: Harmony, compatibility mistake.

subtitles.original: チューリングラブ　騒ぎ出した胸の痛くなるほど
subtitles.english: Turing love, my heart starts to pound so much it hurts.

subtitles.original: 証明はいまも確度を増しているようだ
subtitles.english: The proof seems to be gaining more accuracy even now.

subtitles.original: 曖昧も除外して
subtitles.english: Exclude all ambiguity,

subtitles.original: 最大の仮説を
subtitles.english: and take the greatest hypothesis...

subtitles.original: いまふたりなら　実証できそう
subtitles.english: If it's the two of us now, we might be able to prove it.

subtitles.original: チューリングラブ　見つめあったってキリないメロウ
subtitles.english: Turing love, an endless mellow even if we gaze at each other.

subtitles.original: ワンステップいまは123で上がったって
subtitles.english: One step, even if we went up with 123 now.

subtitles.original: 言葉で生み出すパッション
subtitles.english: The passion created by words.

subtitles.original: ハートで高鳴るアンサー
subtitles.english: The answer pounding in the heart.

subtitles.original: 測ったって不確定性　ぼくらのBPM
subtitles.english: Even if measured, it's uncertainty, our BPM.

subtitles.original: チューリングラブ　宙に舞ったって三世の因果も
subtitles.english: Turing love, even the karma of three lifetimes flying in the air...

subtitles.original: フォーリンラブ　いまはXYZまで解りそうさ
subtitles.english: Fallin' love, now it seems we can understand even XYZ.

subtitles.original: 確かめさせてピタゴラス
subtitles.english: Let me confirm it, Pythagoras.

subtitles.original: 確かめさせて今
subtitles.english: Let me confirm it now.

subtitles.original: 予測済み可塑性　いま触れてみる

subtitles.original: さあ証明しよう
subtitles.english: Now let's prove it,

subtitles.original: 間違いのないように
subtitles.english: so there's no mistake.

subtitles.english: Let's prove it.

subtitles.original: これが私リモートで
subtitles.english: This is the machine

subtitles.original: コントロールする機械です
subtitles.english: I control remotely.

subtitles.original: 少し歪な形しておりますが、
subtitles.english: It has a slightly warped shape,

subtitles.original: 使えます。
subtitles.english: but it works.

subtitles.original: UP SIDE DOWN A B A B B A B A 右左
subtitles.english: Up side down A B A B B A B A Right Left.

subtitles.original: L R L R STOP & Dash & UP & TALK 異常ナシ
subtitles.english: L R L R STOP & Dash & UP & TALK No abnormalities.

subtitles.original: もうちょっとで外に出られるのにな
subtitles.english: I'm almost able to go outside though.

subtitles.original: どうやってもうまくいかねぇ
subtitles.english: No matter what I do, it doesn't go well.

subtitles.original: まだまだ足りない
subtitles.english: Still not enough.

subtitles.original: 座る 座る oh SIT DOWN PLEASE YEAH!
subtitles.english: Sit down, sit down, oh SIT DOWN PLEASE YEAH!

subtitles.original: フィードバックに体預けて
subtitles.english: Entrust your body to the feedback.

subtitles.original: 廻る 廻る oh TURN IT AROUND YEAH!
subtitles.english: Turn around, turn around, oh TURN IT AROUND YEAH!

subtitles.original: 唸りをあげてモーター状態
subtitles.english: Cranking it up, motor state.

subtitles.original: 踊る 踊る oh DANCIN' NIGHT YEAH!
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, oh DANCIN' NIGHT YEAH!

subtitles.original: マッシュアップでもれなくアガる。
subtitles.english: Rising up without fail with a mash-up.

subtitles.original: 声をあげて oh SINGIN' NOW YEAH!
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, oh SINGIN' NOW YEAH!

subtitles.original: あの子よりもうまく歌いたい。
subtitles.english: I want to sing better than that girl.

subtitles.original: これが僕リモートで
subtitles.english: This is the machine

subtitles.original: 操縦できる機械です。
subtitles.english: I can pilot remotely.

subtitles.english: The manual is lost,

subtitles.original: 使えます。
subtitles.english: but it works.

subtitles.english: L R L R STOP & Dash & UP & TALK No abnormalities.

subtitles.original: からかってるみたいないつもの顔
subtitles.english: That usual face that looks like it's teasing.

subtitles.original: 余裕でしょ？
subtitles.english: You're cool, right?

subtitles.original: 今日はかなり本気だぜ？
subtitles.english: I'm pretty serious today, you know?

subtitles.original: ほら すぐキメるぜ
subtitles.english: Look, I'll finish it soon.

subtitles.original: 座る 座る oh SIT DOWN PLEASE YEAH!
subtitles.english: Sit down, sit down, oh SIT DOWN PLEASE YEAH!

subtitles.english: Plug the talkback into your head.

subtitles.original: 廻る 廻る oh TURN IT AROUND YEAH!
subtitles.english: Turn around, turn around, oh TURN IT AROUND YEAH!

subtitles.english: Wait a minute, standby state.

subtitles.original: 踊る 踊る oh DANCIN' NIGHT YEAH!
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, oh DANCIN' NIGHT YEAH!

subtitles.original: ジャストフィットなリズムを出して
subtitles.english: Put out a rhythm that fits just right.

subtitles.original: 唸りあげる oh SINGIN' NOW YEAH!
subtitles.english: Cranking it up, oh SINGIN' NOW YEAH!

subtitles.original: アイツよりも高く歌いたい
subtitles.english: I want to sing higher than that guy.

subtitles.original: 惚れた腫れたの七色侍
subtitles.english: The Seven-Colored Samurai of falling in and out of love.

subtitles.original: 洗いざらい主張する存在
subtitles.english: An existence that asserts everything.

subtitles.original: 思い違いが透けてる塩梅
subtitles.english: A state where misunderstandings are transparent.

subtitles.original: 怖いくらいのWKTK状態
subtitles.english: A "Waku-Teka" state that's almost scary.
